definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

pinyin: Ai1 ji2 gu3 wu4 xue2 zhe3

sentences.english: China may soon make a big contribution to the bank's intellectual ranks.
sentences.chinese: 中国可能很快就会为世行的学者队伍作一个大贡献。

sentences.english: We are reading the Shuobo and partial expert scholar, a strong lineup.
sentences.chinese: 我们是在读硕博及部分专家学者，阵容强大。

sentences.english: As a celebrated scholar living abroad, Ho Peng Yoke is devoted to the study of history of Chinese science and technology.
sentences.chinese: 何丙郁先生是海外研究中国科技史的一位著名学者。

sentences.english: The advanced beginner uses best practices.
Today's researchers decipher it to economic reason, which takes current tho…
sentences.chinese: 学者们以经济原因解之，以今度古之论也。

sentences.english: However, the present studies focus on the successes of Yong-Cheng.
sentences.chinese: 然而，综观目前研究，学者多聚焦于雍正帝的功业。

sentences.english: Although they are plays on words, the scholars can choose one or two of them.
sentences.chinese: 虽为游戏笔墨，但治学者或当有一二可取者耳。

sentences.english: Rabbit Garden Imperial Book Repository should obtain the descendant scholars' enough attention.
sentences.chinese: 敦煌本《兔园策府》应该得到后代学者的足够重视。

sentences.english: The studentapplies for suspension of study due to special difficulties or the student isordered to quit schooling by NMU.
sentences.chinese: 因特殊情况经本人申请或学校认为必须休学或停学者。

sentences.english: Lin Zexu (Lin Tse-hsu ) was a Chinese scholar and official during the Qing dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 林则徐是清朝的学者和官员。

sentences.english: The following section refer to scholars Li Chongfu recent article.
sentences.chinese: 下面引用学者李崇富最近的一段文章。

sentences.english: Shandong is the birthplace of many famous ancient scholars such as Confucious and Mencius.
sentences.chinese: 山东是许多著名学者的故乡，例如孔夫子和孟子。

sentences.english: Philology prevailed very much in Qing Dynasty and especially many top-ranking scholars ever studied it at that time.
sentences.chinese: 清代小学极其昌盛，第一流的学者对小学均多所研究。

sentences.english: Many chemists pay attention to how to make good use of the non-active microorganism.
sentences.chinese: 如何有效合理利用这些菌株，是众多学者关注的问题。

sentences.english: His contributions are outstanding for resumed publication and development of Journal.
sentences.chinese: 他既是优秀编辑，又是宋史研究的学者。
